summary: WHILE DRIVING AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS THE ENGINE SHUT DOWN AND CAUSED LOSS OF POWER STEERING.   *NLM   THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN REPEATEDLY TO THE DEALER.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN BACK AGAIN AND THE DEALER DID NOT FIND THE PROBLEM.  THE GM TECHNICIAN INFORMED THE CONSUMER TO NOT USE CHEVRON GAS.  AFTER GM ADVISED THE DEALER WHAT TO DO, THE PROBLEM WAS RESOLVED.   *SCC   *JB
